rex_ngio_medal.name: Medal
rex_ngio_medal.description: Handles loading and unlocking of medals.

on-get-medals-list-success.description: Triggered when get medals list success.

on-get-medals-list-error.description: Triggered when get medals list error.

for-each-medal.description: Repeat the event for each medal.

current-medal-is-secret.description: Return true if current medal is secret in a For Each loop.

current-medal-is-unlocked.description: Return true if current medal is unlocked in a For Each loop.

compare-current-medal-difficulty.description: Compare difficulty of current medal in a For Each loop.

comparison0.name: Comparison
comparison0.desc: Choose the way to compare difficulty.

index-to-medal-is-secret.description: Return true if medal is secret by index.

index-to-medal-is-unlocked.description: Return true if current medal is unlocked by index.

compare-index-to-medal-difficulty.description: Compare difficulty of medal by index.

comparison1.name: Comparison
comparison1.desc: Choose the way to compare difficulty.

get-list.description: Loads a list of medal objects.

id0.name: ID
id0.desc: The numeric ID of the medal to unlock.

error-message.description: Get last error message from last result.

current-medal-description.description: A short description of the medal in a For Each loop.

current-medal-difficulty.description: The difficulty id of the medal in a For Each loop.

current-medal-icon.description: The URL for the medal's icon in a For Each loop.

current-medal-id.description: The numeric ID of the medal in a For Each loop.

current-medal-name.description: The name of the medal in a For Each loop.

current-medal-value.description: The medal's point value in a For Each loop.

current-medal-is-secret.description: Get 1 if current medal is secret in a For Each loop.

current-medal-is-unlocked.description: Get 1 if current medal is unlocked in a For Each loop.

loop-index.description: Get loop index in for each loop.

index-to-medal-name.description: The name of the medal by index.

index-to-medal-value.description: The medal's point value by index.
